did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: University of Virginia Vice President for Development Office Administrative Files [1969] 1977-1984

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University of Virginia Vice President for Development Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-25/1/1.852, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the library on 1986 February 21.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Administrative files, including case files of various fund-raising efforts, correspondence, newspaper clippings, and memoranda, concerning all segments of the university community.
